revised_title: A Petrified Williamsonia from Scotland: A New Fossil Find
tldr: The author examines a petrified Williamsonia cone from Scotland, providing a detailed description of its structure and comparing it to other known fossil specimens. The cone is found in Jurassic-era limestone nodules and is associated with other plant fossils, such as Pseudoctenis eathiensis and Nilssonia orientalis Heer.
